properties.title: Hippo CMS External Document Picker Base

section.name: Hippo CMS External Document Picker Base
section.p: This project provides base external document picker plugins for Hippo CMS 7 with simple example implementations for developer's references.
This project consists of two different external document pickers: one for External Document Field Picker and the other for External Link Picker Button in the RichText Editor.

subsection.name: External Document Field Picker
subsection.p: External Document Field Picker allows developers to define their own domain specific models to search/select external document(s) for a field of a CMS document. Developers can simply use this forge module plugin class and configurations with injecting their own org.onehippo.forge.exdocpicker.api.ExternalDocumentServiceFacade implementation class.
For detail, please see Architecture and Developers How-to pages.

subsection.name: External Link Picker Button in RichText Editor
subsection.p: This plugin module allows developers to define their own domain specific models to search/select external document(s) in RichText Editor (CKEditor) fields through your own REST Services. Developers can simply add this forge module dependency and add extra CKEditor module configurations for RichText editor configuration(s).
For detail, please see Architecture and Developers How-to pages.

subsection.name: Demo Application with Hippo CMS 7.9.x
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run demo application, which contains all the examples explained in this site documentation.
Here are example commands to check out, build and run demo application:

div.source: $ svn checkout https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/exdocpickerbase/exdocpickerbase-demo/trunk exdocpickerbase-demo-TRUNK $ cd exdocpickerbase-demo-TRUNK $ mvn clean install $ mvn -P cargo.run

subsection.name: Demo Application with Hippo CMS 7.8.x
subsection.p: You can check out, build and run demo application, which contains all the examples explained in this site documentation.
Here are example commands to check out, build and run demo application:

div.source: $ svn checkout https://forge.onehippo.org/svn/exdocpickerbase/exdocpickerbase-demo/branches/exdocpickerbase-demo-1.0.x exdocpickerbase-demo-1.0.x $ cd exdocpickerbase-demo-1.0.x $ mvn clean install $ mvn -P cargo.run

section.name: Testing External Document Field Picker with Demo Application
section.p: Log on to the CMS application and open a news article document. You will see two fields referring to some external documents below. ('Introductory External Document' field and 'Related External Documents' field)

If you edit the document, then you will be able to click on 'Browse...' button for each field to see the following popup dialog. You can search and browse your domain specific external documents there based on your service class implementation. If you select external document(s) and click on the OK button, then the field will be set to those selected external documents.

section.name: Testing External Link Picker Button in the RichText Editor with Demo Application
section.p: Log on to the CMS application and open a news article document to edit the "Body" RichText field. If you select a text and click on the "Link to Hippo Blog Articles" (next to "Anchor" button), then you will see the following popup dialog to search external documents.

img.alt: Popup Link to Hippo Blog Articles

section.p: If you select an item and click on OK button, then you will see the text linked with the external document information.

img.alt: Link created to a Hippo Blog Article
